author: dteague
body:
#### PR description:

For UL, a new format for PartonShower weights is used in the LumiHeader (`isr:murfac=0.5` instead of `isrDefLo`), so this PR is primarily aimed at fixing this for creating the Gen weight table. Further code is added to avoid edge cases where weight names are missing in the header (possibly caused by these names being put in by hand). 

For more discussion, look [at this discussion](https://github.com/cms-nanoAOD/cmssw/issues/546) as well as the comments from [this PR on a different branch](https://github.com/kdlong/cmssw/pull/35)

#### PR validation:

[Here is a list](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Qlg1c6qrMGY0q111Va2Vl0fJQUz15ZTjKEvRaV8rHaQ/edit#gid=0) of files that were tested on. The code was tested in two different modes: `keepAllPSWeights=True` and `keepAllPSWeights=False` (ie only store 4 main variations).
title: Fix PSWeights in LumiHeader to work w diff pythia format
